summary: A production-ready landing page inspired by huly.io, featuring minimal design, smooth animations, and soft gradients. Built with Next.js 16, React 19, Framer Motion, and Tailwind CSS, it delivers an award-worthy first impression with strong conversion focus and full accessibility support.

sections.name: Hero
sections.description: Full-screen hero with animated gradient background, headline, subtext, dual CTAs, social proof, and scroll indicator

sections.name: FeatureGrid
sections.description: 6 feature cards in responsive grid (3 columns desktop, 2 tablet, 1 mobile) with icons, hover effects, and staggered animations

sections.name: Showcase
sections.description: 3 alternating content-visual pairs showcasing platform capabilities with scroll-triggered animations and mock UI previews

sections.name: Testimonials
sections.description: 6 customer testimonials in 3-column grid with ratings, avatars, and company info, plus 4 key stats below

sections.name: CTA_Banner
sections.description: Final conversion section with glassmorphic container, animated gradient background, dual CTAs, and trust indicators

sections.name: Footer
sections.description: Comprehensive footer with brand, 4 link columns, social icons, copyright, and system status

fonts.sans: ui-sans-serif, system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif
fonts.mono: ui-monospace, SFMono-Regular, Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, 'Liberation Mono', 'Courier New', monospace

fade_up.usage: Framer Motion: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}

scroll_parallax.description: opacity and scale transform based on scroll progress

Gradient icon backgrounds with unique colors

accessibility_notes: Maintains proper heading hierarchy throughout (h1 → h2 → h3)
All interactive elements have focus-visible outlines (2px solid ring color)
Comprehensive prefers-reduced-motion support for all animations
Text contrast meets WCAG AA standards (≥ 4.5:1 on all backgrounds)
Keyboard navigation fully supported on all interactive elements
Smooth scroll behavior with reduced-motion override
All images would have alt text (currently using gradient backgrounds)
Form inputs would have proper labels and aria-labels
responsive_design: Typography scales: text-5xl → text-7xl → text-8xl for hero
Grid layouts: 1 column mobile → 2 tablet → 3 desktop
Flexible spacing: py-24 → py-32 for sections
Proper spacing on small screens (px-4 minimum)
performance_optimizations: Framer Motion uses GPU-accelerated transforms (translateY, scale, opacity only)
Lazy animation triggers with Framer Motion viewport once: true
Viewport intersection for scroll animations (no continuous scroll listeners)
Minimal re-renders with proper React hooks
Next.js automatic code splitting by route
No large images or media files in initial components
